answers.answer: Invest in isanity dvds. Its a 60 day program. U will be amazed
I just recently lost 26 lbs in 7 weeks by changing my eating habits and very light weight training. If you'd like further information contact me at ***@****. My name is Moses. Good luck to you
Weight watchers..a decent exercise program and friends and family to encorage you.

I am a single income career mom who only gets to go to the gym on the weekend for about 45 to 60 minutes but also started writing in this food diary and watch what I ate. I also cannot afford any portion of my budget to any weight programs like Weight Watchers. I started to see the scale go down but then hit a plateau. I finally went to nutrition counseling recently who said to lose weight over 40 pounds I needed to start working out 60 minutes 6 times a week and cut my calories by five hundred. any combination of the two if I couldn't go to the gym I needed to cut more calories or if I started working out at the gym I could eat more calories was the balance. I started to make more time for myself by getting out in the neighborhood with the kids and walking, doing a 25 minute quick jog, or using free weights or cardio videos from On Demand at night.  I'm now starting to see the scale move down again so I hope this helps you out too.

I have done insanity it is very physically demanding.If you want to work your way up T25 is excellant.It has the same intensity, shorter and has modified exercises.  Also, P90x is good.  Build muscle while trimming fat with not as much cardio.  Good one to build strength then insanity will shred the fat while maintaining lean muscle mass. Remember to get the ultimate results to like in the before after photos you have to follow the diet plan to a T.   Clean eating.It's better to start with something you will stick with any of these will help you achieve your goal.   There is an app for P90x for less than $10 you can download several workouts to try out before purchasing. All are worth the $$$.

I can't live unhealthy no more because too many people has died of diabetes in my family
